alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 9:55PM CDT until May 23 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Foard County in northern Texas... Northwestern Knox County in northern Texas... Southwestern Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 955 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Childress to 4 miles southwest of Swearingen to 4 miles northeast of Delwin, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Quanah, Crowell, Margaret, Goodlett, Truscott, Copper Breaks State Park, and Lazare. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
